technical_analysis.title: System Diagnostics
technical_analysis.description: In the navigation center, Chief Technician Zara shows you the resonance patterns: 'Look at these frequency spikes - they're not natural harmonic progression. Someone is broadcasting interference signals directly into the Depths. The pattern suggests they know our navigation algorithms intimately. This is sabotage by someone with inside knowledge.'

choices.text: 'Can we trace the source of these interference signals?'
'Who has access to our navigation algorithms?'
'Can we develop countermeasures to block the interference?'
'This sabotage connects to other crisis reports.'
